0YbNzbW0HSKtgStQ.description: If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +4 item bonus to the Intimidation check.
0YbNzbW0HSKtgStQ.name: Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major)

0qJEtpXWPb7JJBbY.description: The components of this ammunition emit a strong smell when combined during its activation. A creature hit by an activated aromatic ammunition gains a distinct odor for up to 1 hour or until the scent is washed off (requiring at least a gallon of water and 10 minutes of scrubbing). Any creatures within 30 feet smell the target, allowing even those with a weak sense of smell to detect its presence, and all creatures gain a +1 item bonus to Track the affected creature for as long as it has the odor. A creature that has imprecise or precise scent doubles the range at which they can detect the target using their scent compared to the normal range of their scent.
0qJEtpXWPb7JJBbY.name: Effect: Aromatic Ammunition

0rkg7SVzs2AetUXw.description: You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet as long as you are holding the charm, and do not need to activate it. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.
0rkg7SVzs2AetUXw.name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Lifesense)

19ECULG5Zp593jQX.description: If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +2 item bonus to the Intimidation check.
19ECULG5Zp593jQX.name: Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate)

1S51uIRb9bnZtpFU.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.aKoMqPDmVzPI7Q20]{Winged Boots}

1S51uIRb9bnZtpFU.name: Effect: Winged Boots

1ihy7Jvw5PY4WYbP.description: While wearing the eye, you gain a +2 item bonus to visual Perception checks.

1ihy7Jvw5PY4WYbP.name: Effect: Eye of the Unseen (Greater)

1tweTwYQuQUV45wJ.description: The Rowan Rifle's damage type changes from its current damage type to cold. On the next sunrise, the Rowan Rifle returns to dealing fire damage.
1tweTwYQuQUV45wJ.name: Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold)

2YgXoHvJfrDHucMr.description: You position your shield to protect yourself. When you have Raised a Shield, you gain its listed circumstance bonus to AC. Your shield remains raised until the start of your next turn.
2YgXoHvJfrDHucMr.name: Effect: Raise a Shield

2iR5uP6vgPzgKKNO.description: After Activating the mask, you also gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased to +3 against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.
2iR5uP6vgPzgKKNO.name: Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate)

2ytxPqhGyLtEjYxW.description: The target takes a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against electricity effects for as long as the persistent electricity damage lasts.
2ytxPqhGyLtEjYxW.name: Effect: Static Snare

  • +2 item bonus to Initiative

4G9qnI0oRyL6eKFQ.name: Effect: Frost Vial (Major)

4JULykNCgQoypsu8.description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 25 feet and a +3 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 hour.
4JULykNCgQoypsu8.name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Major)

4RnEUeYEzC919GZR.description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 sonic damage until the end of your next turn.

5dhm66yN0LQTOePw.description: Each use of the holy steam ball lasts for 1 hour and gives you a +2 item bonus to Will saving throws against possession effects from fiends and undead and effects from fiends and undead that cause the controlled condition.

5lZWAvm0oGxvF4bm.description: For 1 minute after you deal damage to a creature with an activated exsanguinating ammunition that creature gains weakness 3 to persistent bleed damage. Bg4hNMqBx0yqmWYJ.name: Effect: Clockwork Goggles (Major)

CIfqUEC0mITBjwmL.description: As long as it is within 30 feet of you, the summoned creature gains a +1 status bonus to AC. If it ever moves farther than 30 feet from you, the sigil fades and the creature loses the status bonus to AC, even if it later comes within 30 feet of you again.
CIfqUEC0mITBjwmL.name: Effect: Sarkorian God-Caller Garb

ClsVhp5baFRjZQ23.description: The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 acid damage until the end of your next turn.
ClsVhp5baFRjZQ23.name: Effect: Energizing Rune (Acid)

D7teqZ68L21aZCpd.description: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Stealth checks for 2 minutes or until it spends a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. If the creature was @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, the glitter outlines it for 1 round, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} rather than @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to visual senses.
D7teqZ68L21aZCpd.name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure)

DfAyZW2vkhTygZVC.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A superb camouflage suit is fashioned from especially well-blended materials grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.
DfAyZW2vkhTygZVC.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb)

DlqcczhwjfaEf7G1.description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 20 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.
DlqcczhwjfaEf7G1.name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater)

E2uy6gqOXi1HRVBU.description: You gain low-light vision and darkvision for 10 minutes.
E2uy6gqOXi1HRVBU.name: Effect: Clockwork Goggles (Greater)

GNFNDyx8nfNXrgV6.description: The creature takes a -4 status penalty to Stealth checks for 5 minutes or until it spends a 3-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. The glitter continues to fall around the creature until completely removed, leaving a trail behind it as it moves and revealing its rough location; the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, rather than @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, to any creature that can see the glitter whenever it would otherwise have been undetected.
GNFNDyx8nfNXrgV6.name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Critical Failure)

Gj6u2Za5okFlsTvT.description: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to attack rolls for 1 round or until it Escapes (DC 18).
Gj6u2Za5okFlsTvT.name: Effect: Deadweight Snare (Failure/Critical Failure)

H29JukjrSpHe5DXR.description: For 10 minutes after the meal, you gain a +2 item bonus to your Deception checks to Impersonate, as well as to Lie to convince others that you possess knowledge about the type of item that the cake resembles.
H29JukjrSpHe5DXR.name: Effect: Impossible Cake

HaZ5LB1wh1LY5wUy.description: For 1 minute after drinking this potion, you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks to hear. In addition, each time you Seek, your hearing becomes a precise sense until the beginning of your next turn, allowing you to pinpoint creatures' locations and otherwise perceive the world in detail by listening to the sound of echoes.
HaZ5LB1wh1LY5wUy.name: Equipment Effect: Potion of Minute Echoes

Hx4MOTujp5z6SlQu.description: The targets take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds as roots rapidly sprout from their wounds, which lasts until they @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} (DC 20).
Hx4MOTujp5z6SlQu.name: Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalty)

I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi.description: When you're behind an obstacle that could block weapons, guard you against explosions, and make you harder to detect, you're behind cover. Standard cover gives you a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, to Reflex saves against area effects, and to Stealth checks to Hide, Sneak, or otherwise avoid detection. You can increase this to greater cover using the Take Cover basic action, increasing the circumstance bonus to +4. If cover is especially light, typically when it's provided by a creature, you have lesser cover, which grants a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. A creature with standard cover or greater cover can attempt to use Stealth to Hide, but lesser cover isn't sufficient.
I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi.name: Cover

ITAFsW3dQPupJ3DW.description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.BxJNWWvpxacDIsdt]{Tanglefoot Bag (Major)}.

ITAFsW3dQPupJ3DW.name: Effect: Tanglefoot Bag (Major)

T27uDXdMVc5ZFwKw.description: You mentally increase the input of your hearing aids. You gain a +1 item bonus to all hearing-based Perception checks for 10 minutes.

T27uDXdMVc5ZFwKw.name: Effect: Enhanced Hearing Aids

UDfVCATxdLdSzJYJ.description: After Activating the mask, you also gain a +1 item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased to +2 against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.
UDfVCATxdLdSzJYJ.name: Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Lesser)

UTtX0xLGYci6P43I.description: The creature takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed for 1 minute or until it Escapes (DC 27).
UTtX0xLGYci6P43I.name: Effect: Mudrock Snare (Failure)

Uadsb25G18pKdZ2e.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.hmmDa6LCS22dZT7P]{Clandestine Cloak}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 item bonus to Stealth checks
  • +1 item bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate a forgettable background character
  • a -1 item penalty to Diplomacy and Intimidation checks.
Uadsb25G18pKdZ2e.name: Effect: Clandestine Cloak

UlalLihKzDxcOdXL.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.QEPx1fCf74xdpXBH]{Thurible of Revelation (Moderate)}

Automatically applied effects:

UlalLihKzDxcOdXL.name: Effect: Thurible of Revelation (Moderate)

UzSrsR9S2pgMDbbp.description: The cape becomes a pair of golden drake wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 1 hour.
UzSrsR9S2pgMDbbp.name: Effect: Cape of the Open Sky

VIzeuA9tQEQ7V1Ib.description: For the duration of the spell, you can use the limning flames as a source for your magic. Creatures affected by your faerie fire must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or take a -2 status penalty to their Will saves against enchantment and illusions spells as long as they are affected by faerie fire. You can cast an enchantment or illusion spell on such a creature up to a distance twice the spell's normal range. If the spell has a range of touch, or doesn't have a range, it is unaffected by the increase in range from the faerie fire.
VIzeuA9tQEQ7V1Ib.name: Effect: Wand of Fey Flames

VVWvXiNudYYGV9sJ.description: You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour as long as you continue to hold the charm. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.
VVWvXiNudYYGV9sJ.name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense)

VsHhBBLApZsOCJRL.description: You gain resistance 10 to fire and cold for 5 minutes.
VsHhBBLApZsOCJRL.name: Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Greater)

W3BCLbX6j1IqL0uB.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.skBa6D1uxb0b2USn]{Slippers of Spider Climbing}

Automatically applied effects:

W3BCLbX6j1IqL0uB.name: Effect: Slippers of Spider Climbing

W9tKQlA7tVIcAuzw.description: For the next hour, you gain a +3 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +4 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.
W9tKQlA7tVIcAuzw.name: Equipment Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form

WHAp9cDOqnJ1VCcg.description: You receive a +1 status bonus to your Performance check. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
WHAp9cDOqnJ1VCcg.name: Equipment Effect: Orchestral Brooch

WMKjWH4gyUrky4Hy.description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks
WMKjWH4gyUrky4Hy.name: Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 1)

WXrqEuLT4uP48Bvo.description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.rXXNw6dwVn96giDi]{Goggles of Night (Major)}

You gain greater darkvision, which lasts until you rotate the lenses back or the item is no longer invested by you, whicever comes first.
WXrqEuLT4uP48Bvo.name: Effect: Goggles of Night (Major)

WXsWkFosSGBrptwF.description: The construct gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws (except saving throws against the ivory baton).
WXsWkFosSGBrptwF.name: Effect: Ivory Baton

X2ZZgTqanpoCMDmd.description: The General grants its wearer a +3 status bonus to attack rolls with polearms for 1 minute.
X2ZZgTqanpoCMDmd.name: Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The General)

XlHbUOTbK6PfBfCv.description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks
XlHbUOTbK6PfBfCv.name: Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2)

XzxADtNpUlRff972.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision and a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed.
XzxADtNpUlRff972.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
XzxADtNpUlRff972.name: Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form

YI7QQqXO6nosaAKr.description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 20 feet and a +2 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 10 minutes.
YI7QQqXO6nosaAKr.name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater)

ZP9Uq4PVTgzJ3wEi.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 5 to falling damage.
ZP9Uq4PVTgzJ3wEi.name: Equipment Effect: Greater Five-Feather Wreath

ZV9rtVOD1eDTwcY4.description: The creature takes a -4 item penalty to Perception checks.
ZV9rtVOD1eDTwcY4.name: Effect: Grit (Stage 3)

c0URo81HpSmCkuQc.description: You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed for 1 minute. (Defaults to 25)

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your next turn.

While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: the base +2 increase to damage is included in this effect. It cannot currently be made to automatically increase.
eQqi3tWSHwV4SHqK.name: Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed Boost)

While the swirling rings of the vehicle don't fully cover the pilot, they offer incredible protection, magically maintaining the temperature within and ablating physical attacks. exwQF6E1FWmuxwBc.name: Effect: Protective Barrier

jgaDboqENQJaS1sW.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A suit prepared in this manner grants you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.
jgaDboqENQJaS1sW.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit

jlVYoiPVRRVGBj5G.description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 5 Hit Points for 1 minute or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.
jlVYoiPVRRVGBj5G.name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Lesser)

mkjcgwDBeaOUolVe.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision, imprecise scent to a range of 30 feet, and a +10-foot item bonus to your Speed.
mkjcgwDBeaOUolVe.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar

uC6KjfiWrTBXYtP8.description: For 1 minute, you gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed, and adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that touch or hit you with an unarmed attack, take [[/r {2d6}[electricity]]]{2d6 electricity damage} each time. As normal, this applies to creatures who choose to touch you, not when you touch or attack another creature.

uVxs1qFMQsGWXNs6.description: For the next hour, you gain a +2 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +3 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.
uVxs1qFMQsGWXNs6.name: Equipment Effect: Potion of Stable Form

uXEp1rPU5fY4OiBf.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6jRXUXzYKIpm2uNp]{Clandestine Cloak (Greater)}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Stealth checks
  • +2 item bonus to Deception checks to Impersonate a forgettable background character
  • a -1 item penalty to Diplomacy and Intimidation checks.
uXEp1rPU5fY4OiBf.name: Effect: Clandestine Cloak (Greater)

vKooOkXHvtqCgZYg.description: For the next strike, the ammunition fired from the affixed weapon to transforms into acid, dealing acid damage instead of its usual damage as well as [[/r {1d6}[persistent,acid]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Acid Damage} on a critical hit.
vKooOkXHvtqCgZYg.name: Effect: Energized Cartridge (Acid)

vOU4Yv2MyAfYBbmF.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MO8J2IcBhiTnm9D8]{Aeon Stone (Orange Prism)} when the last spell you cast was an Occult spell.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Occultism
vOU4Yv2MyAfYBbmF.name: Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Occultism)

vOgD9wfStLX1utte.description: You leap upon your sword as it soars through the air. You gain a fly Speed of 25 feet or your land Speed, whichever is slower, but you can't Strike with your weapon except via the weapon's other activation. You can Dismiss the activation, and it ends automatically if you cease holding the weapon with at least one hand.
vOgD9wfStLX1utte.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
vOgD9wfStLX1utte.name: Effect: Skyrider Sword (Greater)

vZPyQAt5T2L0Dfmq.description: In this state, a creature that attempts a check to Squeeze uses the outcome one degree of success better than it rolls and can move its full Speed while Squeezing
vZPyQAt5T2L0Dfmq.name: Equipment Effect: Topology Protoplasm

viCX9fZzTWGuoO85.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ZelCRLDI6M5IfjAI]{Cloak of Elvenkind (Greater)}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Stealth checks
viCX9fZzTWGuoO85.name: Effect: Cloak of Elvenkind (Greater)

vj2hkcSbwwRYNLk5.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.
vj2hkcSbwwRYNLk5.name: Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape

w0LUnfS2whVhDBUF.description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Stealth checks for 1 minute or until it uses an Interact action to remove the glitter.
w0LUnfS2whVhDBUF.name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Success)

wFP3SqPoO0bCPmyK.description: When you use the shield to Grapple, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Athletics check.
wFP3SqPoO0bCPmyK.name: Effect: Kraken's Guard

wNCxSxruzLVGtLE4.description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 15 feet and a +1 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 minute.
wNCxSxruzLVGtLE4.name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser)

wacGBDbbQ1HaNZbX.description: You call upon Hyldarf's power to gain the magic of a linnorm for a brief time. For 1 minute, you gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} as well as fire resistance 20.
wacGBDbbQ1HaNZbX.name: Effect: Hyldarf's Fang

yP45Rqu4jvCfXBkp.description: You gain resistance 15 to fire and cold for 10 minutes.
yP45Rqu4jvCfXBkp.name: Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Major)

yt8meGTS7wLa6Fg2.description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 40 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.
yt8meGTS7wLa6Fg2.name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (True)

ytqvHyF0oMKbo65P.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects and a +2 item bonus to your melee Strike damage (this increases to a +4 item bonus to damage if the melee Strike is a jaws attack).
ytqvHyF0oMKbo65P.name: Effect: Crimson Fulcrum Lens

yvabfuAO74pvH8hh.description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MO8J2IcBhiTnm9D8]{Aeon Stone (Orange Prism)} when the last spell you cast was an Arcane spell.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Arcana
yvabfuAO74pvH8hh.name: Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Arcana)

z3ATL8DcRVrT0Uzt.description: The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attacks with the item or other checks requiring a firm grasp on the item.
z3ATL8DcRVrT0Uzt.name: Effect: Disarm (Success)

z8FvdsKEY4lB2L8b.description: For 1 minute, you gain a Fly speed of 40 feet. The first time each round that you Fly (including to hover in place), you shed burning feathers that deal [[/r {3d4}[fire]]]{3d4 fire damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] at the end of your movement (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Phoenix Flask Fire Feathers|traits:consumable,evocation,fire,magical,potion|showDC:all] save).
z8FvdsKEY4lB2L8b.name: Equipment Effect: Phoenix Flask

zDuuHVeHgd175pGf.description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to initiative checks.
zDuuHVeHgd175pGf.name: Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2)

zY7cemRcFD2zAVbC.description:
Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. Choose a weapon or an unarmed Strike; your chosen attack deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} for the next 1 minute.
zY7cemRcFD2zAVbC.name: Effect: Oath of the Devoted

zqKzWGLODgIvtiKf.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.v6LpzpIA0BmKvEtK]{Spellguard Blade}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 circumstance bonus to AC
  • +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells
zqKzWGLODgIvtiKf.name: Effect: Spellguard Blade
